column1: Canadian lumber exports by mode of transportation (x 1,000)
Canadian lumber exports by mode of transportation

column2: This table replaces table 9 of the sawmill publication 35-003X
Canadian lumber exports by province of origin as reported by the International Accounts and Trade Division of Statistics Canada.
The sum of rail, truck and water may not add to total lumber exports, due to small transactions with unclear mode of transportation which appear only in the total.
Data in this table include softwood and hardwood.
